org.spongepowered.api.util.ban

Interface Ban

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Ban.Ip, Ban.User

    public interface Ban
    Represents a ban made on an object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Ban.Ip
      Represents a ban made on an IP.
      static interface  Ban.User
      Represents a ban made on a user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Date> getExpirationDate()
      Gets the expiration date of this ban, if available.
      Text.Literal getReason()
      Get the reason for the ban.
      Optional<CommandSource> getSource()
      Gets the source that banned the user, if available.
      Date getStartDate()
      Gets the start date of the ban.
      BanType getType()
      Gets the type of this ban.
      boolean isIndefinite()
      Gets whether this ban is indefinitely long, e.g.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        BanType getType()
        Gets the type of this ban.
        Returns:
        The ban type

      • getReason

        Text.Literal getReason()
        Get the reason for the ban.
        Returns:
        The reason specified for the ban.

      • getStartDate

        Date getStartDate()
        Gets the start date of the ban.
        Returns:
        Creation date of the ban

      • getSource

        Optional<CommandSource> getSource()
        Gets the source that banned the user, if available.
        Returns:
        The banning source or Optional.absent()

      • getExpirationDate

        Optional<Date> getExpirationDate()
        Gets the expiration date of this ban, if available.
        Returns:
        Expiration time of the ban or Optional.absent()

      • isIndefinite

        boolean isIndefinite()
        Gets whether this ban is indefinitely long, e.g. has no expiration date.
        Returns:
        True if this ban has no expiration date, otherwise false
